description: Puts a retention policy to the specified organization.

parameters.name: FolderConfigurations
parameters.description: The retention policy folder configurations. (dict) --- The configuration applied to an organization's folders by its retention policy. The folder name. The action to take on the folder contents at the end of the folder configuration period. Period (integer) --- The number of days for which the folder-configuration action applies.

nested_params.name: Action
nested_params.description: The action to take on the folder contents at the end of the folder configuration period.

nested_params.name: Period
nested_params.description: The number of days for which the folder-configuration action applies.
